nodes.text: A member of the Adnerem species who worked as a mercenary at some point joined the M'Yalfor'ac Order. By the reign of the New Republic he had reached the postion of officer within the order, serving second only to Quaal Tavier Catharius, the general and leader of the order. The Adnerem was one of only two non-Bitthævrians in the entire order along with a fellow advisor to Quaal, a Khil.
This Adnerem was first mentioned in the West End Games sourcebook Alliance Intelligence Reports published in 1995 as a supplement for their Star Wars Roleplaying game.
